products.title: Mushroom Matt Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution available. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Mushroom matt offers an unusual slant on classic monochrome slats, ideal for fashion-forward interiors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Latte Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A cool khaki tone with a high-beam shine, latte gloss ideal for more rustic environments with a lot of neutral woodgrain or fabric furnishings. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Chateau Blockout Cool Beige Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their cool beige colour - a tone that is perfect as a neutral colour. Product id: sdb-pfp0161 fabric colour: cool beige material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes chateau blockout cool beige solar/thermal perfect fit pleated blind in cream.

products.title: Parchment, Wedgewood - Roman Blind
products.description: Vintage blue meets rustic red in the parchment in wedgewood, where both of these pretty hues are balanced by the ivory background and soft grey detailing. The pattern is intricate and striking, without being overwhelming. Turn your guest bedroom into a real treat for visitors by opting for this unusual colour scheme. Remember to include plenty of home comforts, like a warm duvet, plenty of blankets and throws, and of course, a scatter cushion or two - not to mention a good lamp for ambiance.

products.title: Parchment, Feather - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty parchment range this time offers up a delicate palette of soft blues and barely there greys, in the work of art that is the feather. The ivory white background shows off the soft hues to perfection, making it the ideal base for this floral arrangement. Tone down a blue feature wall in your living room or dining room by pitting the feather against it. Paint the remainder of the walls in ivory or off-white and use blue hues to accent throughout the rest of the room, adding the occasional grey or charcoal for balance and depth.

products.title: Parchment, Fern - Roman Blind
products.description: The delicate foliage and blossom pattern of the parchment in fern is balanced out wonderfully by the strength of the burnt orange and apple green tones used to colour it. The off-white backgrounds shows off the pattern to perfection. Go for an autumnal dcor scheme in your kitchen for ultimate cosiness. Find a balance between warm orange tones and cooler green ones, and include plenty of light and medium woods for a natural look.

products.title: Magnum, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In grey-toned oatmeal, the beige, like the whole magnum range, displays an attractively natural aesthetic, combining its neutral colouring with a textured stitching. The range's translucent, moveable strips allow versatile privacy and light control. For a light, yet protective, window covering in your living room, employ the subtle beige, which will blend perfectly into a chocolate and cream colour scheme.

products.description: The colour here is rich sumptuous neutral, featuring a special slightly sparkly finish that glistens in the light. This blind will coordinate so well with other gold or metallic tones. Delivering sophisticated colour as well as an opulent pattern the rockhampton latte roman bl the colour here is rich sumptuous neutral, featuring a special slightly sparkly finish that glistens in the light.

products.title: Amalia Parchment Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous, cream colouring of the choice amalia parchment roman blind is a clear selling point, beautifully coordinating with most home interiors. The soft, neutral cream shade and the smooth woven design creates an elegant, stylised look, fit for a space that is longing the gorgeous, cream colouring of the choice amalia parchment roman blind is a clear selling point, beautifully coordinating with most home interiors.

products.title: Fretwork Honey Roman Blind
products.description: This lovely geometric fretwork design has been worked up by their good friends at sanderson and then given the blinds 2go touch. Simple and sophisticated it's a great way to introduce pattern into your home. We've picked it out in what's fast becoming a classic combination of rich this lovely geometric fretwork design has been worked up by their good friends at sanderson and then given the blinds 2go touch.

products.title: Nectar Honey Roman Blind
products.description: Delicacy and natural beauty truly come into play with this nectar honey roman blind. Beautifully illustrated bumble bees leave trails of honey as they fly in this remarkable formation. And with its design celebration british wildlife, it should come as no surprise that this stun delicacy and natural beauty truly come into play with this nectar honey roman blind.

products.title: Pippin Honey Roman Blind
products.description: Theres a real feel of summer about the pippin honey roman blind, with a golden tone to its luxurious fabric that reminds us of wheat fields and hazy days. The subtle colour-way is not only gorgeous, it makes for effortless matching too thanks to its neutral overtones.

products.title: Flamingos, Sand - Roman Blind
products.description: The muted blues and soft salmon pinks in the flamingos sand merge with the sandy beige base to create a truly stunning aesthetic. The flamingos are beautifully drawn, sitting pretty against their softly sketched background. Turn the sand into a sensational piece of artwork by hanging it in the master bedroom, where surrounding it with similarly toned shades of blue and coral will pull out the colours of the blind wonderfully.

products.title: Vogue, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In subtle peachy cream, the vogue in beige is a soft and appealing blind, comprising of pliable, tightly stitched fabric and clear, see-through strips. All brackets and controls are concealed neatly in the overhead rail cassette, keeping the look clean and tidy. Pair the beige with pretty corals for a sweet and summery aesthetic in the living room. This 'peaches 'n' cream' look can be easily achieved by sticking to a base of cream and furnishing and accessorising with the coral tones, using them for throws, cushions, and wall hangings.

products.title: Banbury Parchment Mink Curtain
products.description: The banbury parchment mink curtain will beautifully accent an earthy and contemporary interior. It features a striking geometric pattern in a warm grey-brown hue with a textured appearance. This quality fabric curtain is fully lined and is perfect for adding layered interest to your space with soft and sumptuous textiles. products.title: Windsor, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous in soft, vintage gold, the windsor latte is reminiscent of creamy coffee or warm, sticky caramel, making it a delectable and attractive blind. Texture is added to the silky soft fabric using slightly raised ribbing scattered occasionally across its surface. Set the latte against a bold cornflower blue, using it as both a tempering neutral and an highlighting accent to make the blue truly pop.

products.title: Duoshade Mushroom  Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: With lined pockets that stop the sun's harsh rays so elegantly, the perfect fit duoshade mushroom pleated blind is such a smart choice that oozes softness throughout. products.description: Transforming your conservatory from a cold, outdoor space into a warm and homely haven is really, really easy. All you need is this duoshade mushroom perfect fit blind. products.title: Duoshade Beige Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: Blackout, thermal and a smart frame system. There's a whole lot of practical benefits to this perfect fit duoshade beige pleated blinds and these are just a few. products.title: Duoshade Beige Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: Subtle, stylish and extremely efficient, this duoshade beige pleated blind will work wonders at your conservatory window. With specially designed honeycomb pockets to trap the heat, it will provide you with excellent insulation, all year round. With the added benefits of an al subtle, stylish and extremely efficient, this duoshade beige pleated blind will work wonders at your conservatory window.

products.title: William Morris Sunflower Honey Roller Blind
products.description: Part of their collaboration with the v&a, the sunflower honey design is just as charming now as when it was first designed in 1879 by designer william morris. If you want to add a splash of colour to your home or if youre dreaming of summer, sunflower honey would make an ide part of their collaboration with the v&a, the sunflower honey design is just as charming now as when it was first designed in 1879 by designer william morris.

products.title: Honeycomb, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a subtle honeycomb patterning, filled with abstract style daisies in the centre, the honeycomb in stone blends soft grey tones with off-white and sunny yellow. The look is fairly contemporary but will work well in any setting where a tempered, muted feel is on the cards. For a look that will be bang on trend, hang the stone against a soft yellow wall in a study or guest bedroom, where your room will be fashion forward with a grey and yellow colour scheme.

products.title: Honeycomb, Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: To give a big pop of colour to your home, consider the honeycomb in teal. This rich canvas of dark and light teal tones, with honeycomb shapes filled with daisies, offers a strikingly abstract look that you're sure to love. Use the teal to liven up a bright white study or home office, adding a little inspiration as you get down to work. Accent the colours of the fabric with matching teal hues in the form of ornaments and oddments, going for ice white and contemporary furniture.

products.description: The splash beige light filtering skylight blind is a light, natural looking colour for your skylight window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Honeycomb, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: An unusual blind with fascinating patterning, the honeycomb navy features a subtle honeycomb patterning filled with abstract daisies, all in deep navy, mustard, and white tones. You'll love the contemporary feel to this blind, blending nature with abstract in one fell swoop. Use the navy for a cosy feel to a den or sitting room, filling the room with wooden furniture and matching navy tones. Use a gentle white paint for the walls, and highlight with mustard tones in your oddments and wall art.

products.title: Origin, Mushroom - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin mushroom allows you to control the light and shade in your home with minimal effort, whilst at the same time adding a richly authentic aesthetic that gives every modern decorated home the homely touch. Look closer and you'll see the subtle patterning of the voile as it hangs elegantly in front of the fabric. Beiges, sandy browns, and lightly coloured leathers all work beautifully when placed against origin mushroom.

products.description: Their marseille range is a set of wonderful roman blinds in soft colours that will give the room a unique look.
